      public Player getPlayerByName(String playerName)

      playerName - The name of the player to retrieve.
      Returns:

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String playerName, VirtualView client)
      Add the player to the waiting room (the check for max size will be done by the controller)
      Parameters:
      playerName - chosen player name
      client - virtual view linked to the player

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String playerName)
      Remove a player from the waiting room
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player to remove

    • readyToStart

      public boolean readyToStart()
      Returns:
      true if there are at least 2 players and they are all ready to start, else false
